name: Bug Chungus
description:
--READ ME--

This is update 2 we bring YOU 2 new level a new control R to start and yeah thats it 

The full game will be released soon!

A weird platformer around using your mouse and keyboard and maybe some skill and some brain power

--Controls--

W = Jump

Space = Jump

A = Go left

D = Go right

Mouse = Mouse

R = Restart the scene
